title: Patcher Stuck at 33% and Calculating differences.
body: Well, At the moment I have my League Client open and it is stuck at 33% and at the top it has been saying "Calculating differences/" For a long time, the number has gone up to 2000, what do I do? I have tried running League as an admin, but still didn't work.

replies.body:
This Is what I did to fix it

Close out of your patcher and go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\filearchive and delete the filearchive folder. Start your patcher again, wait a bit and it should start updating and go above the 33%.
Thank you so much ~ I've been trying everything! This works!{{summoner:10}}
Give this man a beer

> [{quoted}](name=TheAlbinoThunder,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JfLm3Pww,comment-id=0057,timestamp=2014-09-16T23:00:06.097+0000)
>
> This Is what I did to fix it
> 
> Close out of your patcher and go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\filearchive and delete the filearchive folder. Start your patcher again, wait a bit and it should start updating and go above the 33%.

Listen t this guy. It works. Thank you man. I'm updating Patch 5.23. Its 4:30 and I've been trying since 10 this morning. Only now that i did what @TheAlbinoThunder suggested has it actually started a step.
Worked for me, thank you!

Ok trying this because other "fixes" involve opening up command windows and fuck that my computer and I have an unspoken rule I don't do that it doesn't crash on me.... often. This is patch 5.4 for future reference. 

Deleting filearchive, oh god it was 2 GB this is gonna take a while.

Reopened LOL, Scanning files hmmm not promising but give it a minute or five curse you imgur, sometime along there it changed to Step 2 updating thanks fuck no more scanning files.

Ten minutes later my % has gone to 46% yes! only 54% more baby you can do this!
As my two room mates patch fine and start playing matches fuck off it's an internet connection problem. 

Oh. Oh no 64% and 0 KBps, Imma  make a cup of tea come back and hope it starts up again.

Sigh ok shutting down the launcher and relaunching hopefully this doesn't bork it right? hahah haaaa......
And shutting down the process in Task Manager my only other trick besides turning it off and back on again, yes gaming technotard feel free to know I've heard it all before.

Ok back at 33% but it's downloading, at 400KBps but it's downloading right? time stamp 10:00 Pm been at this an hour now, yay above 33%.... I'm going to get a book while I wait.

Aaaand 65% at 0KBps. 10:23 PM we'll give er 15 minutes this time and well we will see.

Oh it started again yay 66% and climbing.

And 73% and stalled again 10:37 been at this and hour and a half.

11:03 SUCCESS! Thanks for the fix it was a ride but it appears to have worked.
How do you get to this on a Mac?

Im still updating, but to get to the files as mentioned by TheAlbinoThunder, you go to applications, find league of legends, then right click into show package contents.  Then you should be able to follow the steps mentioned above.
not working bro
THANK YOU!!! IT WORKED!
mine wont work
didnt change anything. normally just deleting the launcher file in projects works but it isnt this time.
My hero. It worked.

Hey guys,

When your patcher hits 33%, it can be fairly hard to identify the root cause.  There are two primary reasons why a patch can fail at this point:

1. There are permission issues with files being properly opened on your computer, or certain files are corrupted.
2. Your computer is unable to properly connect to our Servers to identify what files are needed or cannot be downloaded.

Because of this, make sure to try the steps in this discussion:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/zPUA7Zyg-new-having-issues-patching-416-click-here

The steps here will commonly resolve the majority of issues with the patcher failing.  If you have tried the steps in these guides, and you are still unable to see the much desired Log-in Screen, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) to us here in Player Support!  We can work with you one-on-one to get this resolved!  If you do submit a ticket, include the following logs:

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3

> There are permission issues with files being properly opened on your computer, or certain files are corrupted.

**There aren't file permission issues when ran as Administrator.  There is also very likely no corruption issues as the client was used 16 hours ago, closed properly, and the computer shut down properly.**

>  Your computer is unable to properly connect to our Servers to identify what files are needed or cannot be downloaded.

**Amazonaws and akamaitechnologies are your servers?  Really?  I don't think so.  Why don't you have a chat with them and figure out where this mess with timeouts and such are occurring.  The only thing I see that could be your server is 104.16.27.33  I haven't bothered to tracert yet.**

**If I was having connection issues, why am I updating the Interface just fine but then it hangs on game files?  It's most likely an ISP or server issue at your end.**

> Because of this, make sure to try the steps in this discussion:

**I'll pass.  Same generic steps you have listed since 2011.  As usual, you shift the cause of the issue to the customers before checking your end first.  **
I agree, none of these things work and I've gone through countless patches never encountering this problem, so why now? Very annoying.{{champion:17}}
Did all these, nothing worked.

I had to reinstall to fix this, and make sure when you re-install that it's to the default location and not one you've manually changed. At least, that's what support suggested to me when I spoke to them.

Hey YGVexation,

Could you send us your patcher logs?

*If you got an error message while patching, you can follow these steps:*
**Steps if you saw an error message while patching :**
1) Open **Patcher**, go to **options **menu and select **Save Logs** (options is the gear icon on the top right of the patcher).
2) Add them as an attachment here or upload them to a fileshare application of your choice (dropbox, google drive, etc)
3) If uploaded to a fileshare application, leave a link for them in this thread.

*If save logs button is not enabled in the patcher you can zip up your Patcher Logs folder and send us that. Here's how:*
**Steps if you have Windows:**
1) Right click on **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Patcher Logs** select** Send To --> Compressed(zipped) folder**. This will compress the patcher logs into a nice zip file.
2) Add them as an attachment here or upload them to a fileshare application of your choice (dropbox, google drive, etc)
3) If uploaded to a fileshare application, leave a link for them in this thread.

**Steps if you have OSX:**
1) go to:** Finder --> Applications --> Press Control + Click --> Show Package Contents--> Contents --> LoL --> Logs**
2) Press** Control + Click -->** and select **Compress Patcher Logs**
3) Add them as an attachment here or upload them to a fileshare application of your choice (dropbox, google drive, etc)
4) If uploaded to a fileshare application, leave a link for them in this thread.

Like I mentioned before, this issue is not easy to reproduce so player logs would be greatly appreciated.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B19yIq3XpaRiell2bGNlVEhJcFE/edit?usp=sharing fix please!!

Thank you for sending us your logs. I took a look a look at all of them and it looks like you cancelled the patch at about 30-40 seconds in every time.

There have been several hotfixes that have been deployed after the 4.16 release so just give it a bit more time to scan and patch out. :)

2016 and my league still wont load, it either goes down to 0kps and doesnt do anything (internet is perfectly fine) or it has stopped at 33%, left it on all night hoping it would actually doing something besides pissing me off, but to my surprise it still aint doing shit. really poor this situation as clearly been resolved

Close out of your patcher and go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_game_client\filearchive and delete the filearchive folder. Start your patcher again, wait a bit and it should start updating and go above the 33%. This works for 90% of your problems when it come to issues with the launcher and patch updates ( especially if you close out of LoL in the middle of a patch update )

Hey everyone,

If you're still having this issue, please send us your logs so we can investigate. You can do that by going into the patcher and selecting Save Logs through the options menu (gear icon on the top right). You can add them as an attachment here or upload them to a fileshare application of your choice (dropbox, google drive, etc) and then leave a link for them in this thread.  

Thanks ^^~

Having same issue.  I think what most of us would appreciate is simply the acknowledgement that said problem does exist and that you are aware of it.  The "try the solutions from years ago response" although not entirely invalid; clearly ignores the here and now real issues, and raging emotions your devoted players are facing.  I personally along with many others have faith in you guys.  But sometimes transparency is clearly the best policy.  You are not a weaker company by simply admitting everything's not perfect.  We would simply appreciate the affirmation that the problem is real to you guys, and you are working on it.  Thanks. Viper
